meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a stereomicroscope.
meanings.sent1: The stereomicroscopic image showed tiny details clearly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a stereomicroscopic lens to study the specimen.
meanings.sent3: The stereomicroscopic view made the insect look like a giant monster!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as sharp as a stereomicroscopic lens.
meanings.sent5: The stereomicroscopic examination revealed hidden patterns.

meanings.definition: Able to be viewed or examined using a stereomicroscope.
meanings.sent1: The small object was stereomicroscopic and required special equipment to see.
meanings.sent2: The intricate design was only visible under a stereomicroscopic lens.
meanings.sent3: Trying to find the lost earring was like a stereomicroscopic treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail was stereomicroscopic, noticing things others missed.
meanings.sent5: The stereomicroscopic examination revealed hidden details.
